title: Data Residency Plan
text: Applicants must demonstrate a clear plan for storing Personal Identifiable Information (PII) and transactional data for Qatari customers on servers physically located in Qatar. Cloud providers must have Qatar-based data centers or approved data hosting arrangements. Applicants should show timeline and commitments for implementation.

title: Source of Funds Verification Policy
text: For high-risk transactions or transactions exceeding QAR 50,000, financial institutions must have documented procedures to verify the source of funds and source of wealth. Records retention policy for at least 5 years must be established.

title: Compliance Officer Designation
text: Applicants must identify a designated Compliance Officer candidate with appropriate qualifications. The officer will require QCB approval before final licensing. Documentation should show the officer will have direct Board reporting and adequate resources.

title: AML/CFT Policy Framework
text: A comprehensive Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism (AML/CFT) policy must be drafted with monitoring rules, transaction screening, and reporting procedures. Board approval is required before licensing, but draft policies are acceptable for initial assessment.

title: Minimum Capital Requirements
text: Fintech companies must commit to minimum paid-up capital of QAR 10,000,000 for full banking licenses, or QAR 5,000,000 for limited payment service licenses. Applicants should demonstrate capital availability through shareholder commitments, funding agreements, or current financial position.

title: Cybersecurity Framework
text: Applicants must demonstrate implementation or commitment to implement ISO 27001 or equivalent cybersecurity framework. Plans for penetration testing, incident response procedures, and security audit schedules should be documented.

title: Customer Due Diligence (CDD) Procedures
text: Enhanced Customer Due Diligence (CDD) procedures must be documented, covering identity verification, beneficial ownership identification, and ongoing transaction monitoring. Policies should be comprehensive even if not yet fully implemented.

title: Corporate Governance Structure
text: Fintech firms must plan for a qualified Board of Directors with at least 3 members, including independent directors. Applicants should identify board candidates and outline governance framework for QCB review and approval.

title: Business Continuity Planning
text: A documented Business Continuity Plan (BCP) and Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP) must be developed, including backup procedures, recovery time objectives, and annual testing protocols.

title: Consumer Protection Policies
text: Clear consumer protection policies must be documented, including complaint handling procedures, dispute resolution mechanisms, fee transparency, and data privacy protections in accordance with Qatar's data protection laws.
